alert.note: Alert for Archer; Baylor; Clay; Foard; Hardeman; Knox; Wichita; Wilbarger (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Child Abduction Emergency issued December 21 at 9:32PM CST by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: THE FOLLOWING MESSAGE IS TRANSMITTED AT THE REQUEST OF THE TEXAS DEPARTMENT OF PUBLIC SAFETY. THE MEDINA COUNTY SHERIFF`S OFFICE IS SEARCHING FOR LUCAS WRIGHT, WHITE, MALE, 9 YEARS OLD, 4 FEET 5 INCHES, 70 POUNDS, BROWN HAIR, HAZEL EYES, AND WEARING ALL GREEN OUTERWEAR, LL BEAN ORANGE, BLUE, AND WHITE UNDER-COAT, GRAY ADIDAS SHOES WITH RED BOTTOMS. THE MEDINA COUNTY SHERIFF`S OFFICE IS SEARCHING FOR ARIANA WRIGHT, WHITE, FEMALE, 8 YEARS OLD, 4 FEET 5 INCHES, 70 POUNDS, BROWN HAIR, HAZEL EYES, AND WEARING ALL GREEN OUTERWEAR, LL BEAN PURPLE UNDER-COAT, BROWN BOOTS WITH A CAMO LEAF TOP. THE MEDINA COUNTY SHERIFF`S OFFICE IS SEARCHING FOR JONATHAN WRIGHT, WHITE, MALE, 11 YEARS OLD, 4 FEET 8 INCHES, 80 POUNDS, BROWN HAIR, BROWN EYES, AND WEARING ALL GREEN OUTERWEAR, LL BEAN BRIGHT BLUE UNDER-COAT, GRAY ADIDAS SHOES WITH RED BOTTOMS. POLICE ARE LOOKING FOR JONATHAN ALEXANDER WRIGHT, WHITE, MALE, 40 YEARS OLD, 5 FEET 9 INCHES, 170 POUNDS, BROWN HAIR, BROWN EYES AND POSSIBLY WEAING A GREEN JACKET OR HOODIE, IN CONNECTION WITH THEIR ABDUCTION. THE SUSPECT WAS LAST HEARD FROM AT 3:45 PM ON DECEMBER 20, 2021 NEAR COUNTY ROAD 366 AND FARM TO MARKET ROAD 2676 IN HONDO, TX ON FOOT. LAW ENFORCEMENT OFFICIALS BELIEVE THESE CHILDREN TO BE IN GRAVE OR IMMEDIATE DANGER. IF YOU HAVE ANY INFORMATION REGARDING THIS ABDUCTION, CALL THE MEDINA COUNTY SHERIFF`S OFFICE AT 8 3 0 7 4 1 6 1 5 3.
